Package boofcv.examples.sfm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExampleMultiviewSceneReconstruction
    Demonstration on how to do 3D reconstruction from a set of unordered photos with known intrinsic camera calibration.
    ExampleMultiviewSceneReconstruction.Feature3D  
    ExamplePnP
    The Perspective-n-Point problem or PnP for short, is a problem where there are N observations of points with known 3D coordinates.
    ExampleVisualOdometryDepth
    Bare bones example showing how to estimate the camera's ego-motion using a depth camera system, e.g.
    ExampleVisualOdometryMonocularPlane
    Bare bones example showing how to estimate the camera's ego-motion using a single camera and a known plane.
    ExampleVisualOdometryStereo
    Bare bones example showing how to estimate the camera's ego-motion using a stereo camera system.
